game.description: Your role as the hero has been requested by the kingdom to retrieve the lost artifact known as the "Heart of the Ocean".
game.objective: Retrieve the Heart of the Ocean from the Abyssal Depths.
game.reward: 2000 gold coins and the Sword of Valour

tasks.description: Speak to the royal mapmaker in the castle to obtain the map to the Abyssal Depths.
tasks.objective: Obtain map to the Abyssal Depths

tasks.description: Navigate through the Abyssal Depths, fighting off any sea creatures that stand in your way.
tasks.objective: Reach the Heart of the Ocean

tasks.description: Retrieve the Heart of the Ocean and bring it back to King Theron.
tasks.objective: Return the Heart of the Ocean to King Theron

game.title: Heart of the Ocean
